name: Zscaler, Inc.
description: Test fixture with real ZS data that contains price volatility anomalies. Perfect for testing both rule-based and LLM analysis without API calls.

expected_output.anomaly_detection: Market scanner should detect large daily moves and high-price positions
expected_output.rationale: Strong revenue growth (25% YoY), positive analyst consensus (41 buy/strong buy out of 55), and improving guidance. Price volatility shows strong interest. Main risk is high valuation and current unprofitability.

validation_notes: Expected to generate BUY signal with strong anomalies detected in market scan stage. Suitable for testing complete LLM pipeline (rule-based anomaly detection + LLM analysis).
